name: obsidian-kanban
description: Obsidian plugin for creating kanban boards from tagged notes

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: cp main.js deployment/ && cp styles.css deployment/ && cp manifest.json deployment/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: sebastianGruenwald
